function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate identification of potential drugs for clinical trials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid capture of varied information from the environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Millions of data points pouring in from various sources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ml and ai algorithms distilling data into relevant knowledge for better customer service","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capturing contactless screening data from millions of patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skyrocketing calls to service centers in airline, hospitality, banking industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on chatbots for customer service","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of automation and ai in service businesses may reduce the need for human interaction, potentially limiting the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drone delivery and robot-powered delivery vehicles may minimize the need for human delivery personnel, reducing the potential for disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of ml and ai in service firms may optimize business operations, reducing the need for human involvement and potentially limiting disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of economic revenue in a business model due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized philanthropic contributions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low margins and financial constraints","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilized spare capacity during covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of revenue leading to industry distress","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of permanent demand decrements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential health risks from conducting humanitarian missions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate employee training and education levels may lead to ineffective delivery of new services, such as online cooking classes and web-based services.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant decrease in demand for air travel and car rental services due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion through handling of ingredients and cooking equipment in multiple households.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tinkering with the demand and supply chain may lead to compromised productive capacity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusive shopping hours for vulnerable customers may not effectively minimize out-of-stock situations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Service firms may struggle to create new meaning for customers during shelter at home orders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possibility of virus reemergence leading to reintroduction of shelter-at-home decrees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelm of system due to demand surges","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to de-densify small premises leading to limited social distancing measures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial investments required for strategic partnerships and web design for delivery risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding in service venues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and confidence in service venues","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear and inconsistent social distancing rules and laws","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing rules","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on internal rules rather than external legal environment","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for respiratory droplet transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social acceptance and legitimacy of businesses in the context of social distancing","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rise in demand for delivery services due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uber’s policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted uber’s business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uber’s decision to deliver food from small restaurants free of charge may lead to risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People staying home and consuming digital content","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial institutions offering educational
